segments.text: Do you see that small white car over there ? It ’ s Tom ’ s new car .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God . It ’ s beautiful . But it looks expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is very expensive . Tom ’ s father paid for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to have a car like that . But I am not rich . And I don ’ t have a rich daddy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are By new models now , they are not very expensive . Maybe you should look for one .
segments.speaker: S1
